site_name: DREAM HAYVEN FARM L L C

citations.narrative:
The facility has not yet documented a contingency plan. Planning for an emergency in advance will help provide for
appropriate handling, treatment, transportation, housing and care of the animals in the event of an emergency or disaster.
The facility shall develop and document an appropriate contingency plan for the animals in the event of an emergency or
disaster. Correct by 11/7/22.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.134 
   
Contingency planning. 
The facility has not yet documented a contingency plan. Planning for an emergency in advance will help provide for 
appropriate handling, treatment, transportation, housing and care of the animals in the event of an emergency or disaster. 
The facility shall develop and document an appropriate contingency plan for the animals in the event of an emergency or 
disaster. Correct by 11/7/22. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
